26
27#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
28
29#include <sys/systm.h>
30#include <sys/cmn_err.h>
31#include <sys/kobj.h>
32
33struct zchdr {
34 uint_t zch_magic;
35 uint_t zch_size;
36};
37
38#define ZCH_MAGIC 0x3cc13cc1
39
40/*ARGSUSED*/
41void *
42zcalloc(void *opaque, uint_t items, uint_t size)
43{
44 size_t nbytes = sizeof (struct zchdr) + items * size;
45 struct zchdr *z = kobj_zalloc(nbytes, KM_NOWAIT|KM_TMP);
46
47 if (z == NULL)
48 return (NULL);
49
50 z->zch_magic = ZCH_MAGIC;
51 z->zch_size = nbytes;
52
53 return (z + 1);
54}
55
56/*ARGSUSED*/
57void
58zcfree(void *opaque, void *ptr)
59{
60 struct zchdr *z = ((struct zchdr *)ptr) - 1;
61
62 if (z->zch_magic != ZCH_MAGIC)
63 panic("zcfree region corrupt: hdr=%p ptr=%p", (void *)z, ptr);
64
65 kobj_free(z, z->zch_size);
66}
67
68void
69zmemcpy(void *dest, const void *source, uint_t len)
70{
71 bcopy(source, dest, len);
72}
73
74int
75zmemcmp(const void *s1, const void *s2, uint_t len)
76{
77 return (bcmp(s1, s2, len));
78}
79
80void
81zmemzero(void *dest, uint_t len)
82{
83 bzero(dest, len);
84}
85
